lender.loan_because: I care

lender.loan_because: I have been blessed to have wonderful people in my life who have assisted me with my goals....so it's great to pass that blessing along to others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office during the week, but my free time is spent working on my passion...honeybees and encaustic art.

lender.occupational_info: I help people that want to purchase homes learn about the home buying process then locate the approproate property for them to acquire.

lender.occupational_info: I work part-time and I go to school full time, and I am grateful to have the opportunity to do both.

lender.name: Cecelia

lender.loan_because: everyone needs a helping hand now and then.

lender.name: Sahil
lender.loan_because: if I can so should everyone.

lender.name: Brock
lender.loan_because: it mskes me happy to see all the good i can do
lender.occupational_info: i attend a catholic school

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: One thing we should all do is help those who need help, and lending money is probably both the easiest and most effective way way to do just that for those who are far away.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I want to stimulate third-world economies.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time student.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I would like to see someone else succeed being self-employed
lender.occupational_info: I am a gardener and work with plants

lender.name: Frugalista Japan
lender.loan_because:
- I am atheist. I believe it is the right thing to do.
- I live a frugal life so that I might give back to those in need
- I earn enough to live a good, full life. I hope that I can enable others to do so, too.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: It will change the world.

lender.name: Nimish
lender.loan_because: in my small way, I can give back
lender.occupational_info: I look at how things run in a company, and I try and understand why they are that way, and how you need to change things to make the process better for your goals. I do process analysis.

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: it suits me.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be a philosopher.

lender.name: Kari
lender.loan_because: We all come to our time of need and don't know how we're going to make it through...and knowing that I can help lift some of that weight helps me get through mine.
lender.occupational_info: Student of the arts and the world

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because:
I believe that to work against poverty and hunger it to work for world peace. ~~~ I loan because of my ethical and religious beliefs. First, I think that fighting poverty and hunger are key aspects of working towards world peace and improving the world. I think that micro-loans are one aspect of that, and are a supplement to traditional charity.
Traditional charity provides the basics. A person without clean water, shelter, food, basic education, or who is dealing with socio-political upheavals (military uprisings, genocides, landmine areas), would need "traditional" charity. This is where we simply help those in grave need. One cannot "make a loan" for clean water, a sanitary latrine, landmine clearing, malaria medications, or dengue fever vaccines.
The value of Kiva is in areas where there is already an infrastructure and stable (or stable-ish) government and economy. This allows people to raise themselves out of survival and into a more self-sustaining living. With access to small business loans, people can improve not only the lives of their family, but strengthen their immediate community. As people create successful local businesses and services, more money circulates through a community, raising the standard of living.
I do not think that Kiva is a solution to poverty. I do think it is an important tool in fighting poverty, and a way to shrink the edges of poverty, lifting people out of it through their own work.
My second reason is more religious. I believe that good deeds propagate, and successful loans improve the lives of others indirectly. I do, and always have, believed in reincarnation. I believe we not only have an obligation to improve the world for our children, but also for our souls when they return. I think that by improving the world, we expand the growth possible by successive generations, be they our descendants or ourselves. I think that this kind of mindset is ultimately necessary for mankind. I believe we have to start improving the present so that humankind as a collective can grow.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital. I help keep the computers working.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: "Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world. Indeed it is the only thing that ever has." Margaret Mead

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: it is a sustainable way to help people. We're talking about a few hundred bucks that I'd rather have in the hands of people who are working to climb out of poverty than people who are just using it to get even richer. Its is an equalizing process, an enriching process, and a humanizing process.
lender.occupational_info: I currently teach high school history in a charter school in the South Bronx.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It seems like a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a scientist. I work with microscopic organisms that live in boiling acid pools.

lender.name: lauren
lender.loan_because: I'm finally at a point in my life where I can help other people for once!

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: Opportunities are meant for everyone and maybe they will pay it forward oneday.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the Information Technology (IT)field and work with computers in Afghanistan.

lender.name: Zach Weiner
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people who help themselves, and knowing that I'm working for a good cause without throwing time and money into a black hole.
lender.occupational_info: I draw comic strips.

lender.name: EandT
lender.loan_because: We want to help people build a better life for themselves and their children
lender.occupational_info: We walk dogs to raise money for animals and people in need.

lender.name: Colin & Lori
lender.loan_because: Helping those that are (through no fault of their own) less fortunate is just the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Photographer & Real Estate Management. We have had the opportunity to travel to many countries and have seen how many people could use a helping hand & how a small bit of help can make a big difference.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I want to believe an idea like this can work.

lender.name: Dale
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of changing the world! even through small ways like this.... I believe that if a lot of people would contribute even a little of what they have, we would have a much, much better world!
lender.occupational_info: I started a small non profit organization in one of the rural areas in the Philippines, it has been financially supporting kids in their education since 2001. There is still so much more to be done though...

lender.name: Marcus
lender.loan_because: I would like to go into sustainable development.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student pursuing a career in helping third world country individuals.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I care. And I want to give back.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Christ commands us to help the least of His children. I love helping the helpless! I hate helping the clueless! Kiva is a great way to help those who are working to help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: I pastor a small church.

lender.name: angelica
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I work with real estate agents to provide funds for people to trying to purchase a home.

lender.name: Jill
lender.occupational_info: I encourage older women to value themselves and be proud of their bodies by having them tastefully photographed. Youth does not have a monopoly on beauty and self confidence.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I like my money making a differents. This is an experiment for me and I view it more positively than just giving a charitable aid. The old Proverb: teach someone to fish and they catch fish for a lifetime.
lender.occupational_info:
Student: learning to help myself and others.
Security: What I do to enable me being a student.

lender.loan_because: I'm paying it forward - I'm passing the gift I was given on to another person.
lender.occupational_info: I help people heal from physical accidents, recover from emotional traumas, and move towards their goals. I also enjoy taking pictures of Divine Love in action.

lender.occupational_info: I am a retire professional real estate developer. I have written three teaching e-books and made several CD and DVD that teach individuals how to become developers.

lender.name: caspar
lender.loan_because: To help economically less fortunate people

lender.name: Rachel BoKyoung
lender.loan_because: I learned many developing countries, and I recognized that there are still a lot of people who suffer from poverty. I really want to help them. To get rid of the poverty, I think we should give them an opportunity to sustain/start their jobs. As a student majoring in Finance, I want to let them know how to manage their business and money successfully if possible. And in the future, I want to establish a microfinance bank for them.
lender.occupational_info: I currently am a student at University of Southern California, concentrating on Finance and Business Economics.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of micro lending
lender.occupational_info: I am a college professor and business consultant who specializes in supply chain systems.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: This is the best development tool I can think of. It's simple, efficient and brings the money right where it is needed.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a project manager for the local government in the Vaucluse area in the South of France.

lender.name: ravi
lender.loan_because: it can be the answer someone is hoping for, in order to grow their business and get ahead in life - and Kiva really makes it easy to lend & relend the repayments. "A Kiva gift certificate from Michael Peachey (http://www.kiva.org/lender/mpeachey) was my initial spark. The hardships faced by Kiva entrepreneurs moved me & I realized that I could reach out via Kiva. At a presentation by Kiva Fellow, Jessica Heinzelman (http://www.kiva.org/lender/jessica3045), I learned first-hand how real Kiva is. Empowered, I began exploring more of Kiva."

lender.name: Christine & Russell
lender.loan_because: We heard about Kiva by chance on the radio and how many other aid agencies cannot deliver assistance effectively with any long term benefits. The KIVA model, administration and ease of use was both appealing and engaging. We hope that the contributions made by us will make a sustainable difference to everyone.
lender.occupational_info: Headteacher; Pub Retailing managing supply chain, recruitment and gaming in the UK

lender.loan_because: It's an awesome thing to do.

lender.occupational_info: I have a family and on the side I volunteer for a citizen's economic justice organization called Attac.

lender.name: isa
lender.loan_because: my name is isa , am living in bahrain in the middile east & my father retired + my mother house wife & i have 5 brothers + 3 sisters my father salary not exceeding 200bd & newly i got engaged & frankly i want to marriage , build house for me & my wife + i am feeling upset ,unsatisfy & i dont know what to di plz plz as much as possible help mey brothers & sisters

And Kiva is one of the hopes those hard workers see, and one of the tools to share the people a little I have. (very tiny though!!)
lender.occupational_info:
Work for International NGO, Habitat for Humanity.
---------------------------------------------------------- Fight Poverty Housing. Build A Home. Change Someone’s Life – It Could Be Yours ----------------------------------------------------------
Habitat for Humanity(HFH) has built, renovated and repaired over 300,000 homes around the world, providing more than one-and-a-half million people in thousands of communities in countries and territories across six continents with safe, decent, affordable shelter. Its headquarters is located in Americus, Georgia, USA.
Habitat for Humanity Japan(Habitat Japan) sends over 800 volunteers to Habitat's overseas building trip called "Global Village" program to Asia Pacific countries, every year.
Global Village offers volunteers the chance to experience a unique camaraderie and build lasting friendships with fellow team members, and with Habitat home partner families. Global Village is a journey that will transform your life.

I am very happy to do this because I can be satisfied in full. because they see the smile is the satisfaction I

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Jeff C.

lender.name: Carrie Lynn
lender.occupational_info: Support Arts and Culture

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: If I have I lovingly give.
lender.occupational_info: After an accident I was unable to work ;My days of helping others thru Massage/Physical Therapy/Reiki...30 years...I never thought I would be the one in need of body,mind,and spirit healing. I had a break-down and am alone; no family or friends-- Iam reclusive in social situations(So I was hauled into a psychiatric hospital )Broken in Spirit and body. I adopted from a shelter and took home too many kittens and cats. I found out quickly , I didn't know how to really take care of my fuzzy friends. Many years have come and gone ; I see cruelty to Innocents and the deep pain I feel is unbearable. I advocate for cancer survuvors,so they get a quality of life; I advocate for animals so they too feel quality of life. I receive a stipend from social security;and just squeek by. God has given me the gifts of creativity and healing; helping others. I feel a powerful need to create art and music and poems to raise donations so I may give to others to love and shelter the innocence that I wish I could. So I have no children; Im 49,animals are my little loves and all Innocent animals;I pray for the dead I see on the country road side and pray too for the shelter animals in the local shelters as well. I donate donate donate and eat rice and beans and potatos. I have the talent to create love in the form of art,music etc... I need help in getting my Love out in the form of note cards, stories,songs,poems, art and teaching manuals (for donations) so others can care and love for their pets properly. Ive seen shameful beatings of Innocence and screaming from animals that are in crisis--- I can only pray. I pray that my art etc..will be able to be sold everywhere like Kliban or Garfield so that I may help as many Innocent domestic and wild animals of all kinds be loved. I teach others how to care for domestic animals, I need help to help others who care and would like to know how to care. My gift from God I give to you and Innocence.

lender.name: KEFUS
lender.loan_because: We Are All Connected & I believe in "Paying It Forward". If my actions can bring about a positive change in the life/ lives of another/others, then I am truly grateful to have an opportunity to contribute my part in such a change.
lender.occupational_info: Call me a dreamer!,But I'd like to think that creating & sharing my music with the world may help to remind people that we are all spiritual beings struggling with the human experience. "All We Need Is Love" "We Are What We Think, All That We Are Arises With Our Thoughts, With Our Thoughts We Make The World"!!!!!! Peace & Blessings To All

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: It just feels like a natural thing to do. Fate often determines which opportunities are open to us… I admire those who make the best of limited opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an independent technology sales company involved in selling electronic components and Chinese manufacturing services to UK clients

lender.name: Guido Struben
lender.loan_because: I've traveled to various third world countries and experienced the poverty there first hand. I would like to help people in these types of conditions around the world to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Web Site Development

lender.name: Altrusa of Montrose CO
lender.loan_because: Altrusa is an international service organization which provides community service, enhances leadership and personal development, and encourages fellowship. Our vision: Giving the gifts of leadership and service to communities worldwide.
lender.occupational_info: We do many volunteer projects to help people in our own community as well as around the world. Our primary focus is on Literacy, but we also have many projects related to health, education, environment, and much more.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: A little bit of money can really help change someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I install and maintain workstations and servers for a K-12 school district.

lender.name: jacob
lender.loan_because: i would like to help people have a chance like i did once.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a fast food resturant. I have been in management for 5 years and have lots of experience

lender.name: Nacho
lender.loan_because: I think it is a great way to really help developing communities in a much more effective way than traditional NGO donations. The fact of virtually meeting the loan receiver, believe in his/her story and commit to it is key in the success of Kiva.

lender.name: Hugh
lender.loan_because: It helps people do it for themself. Gets away from the big banks and also makes me feel good inside

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with a wonderful family and good health. I lend because I can!

lender.name: Discounted Golf Shoes
lender.loan_because: The internet has been an amazing gift to me and has allowed me to survive through thick and thin. It has provided for my family and I am looking to pay it forward when I can.
lender.occupational_info: I run online stores and marketing for companies including myself.

lender.name: JimmyP
lender.loan_because: I have been hard working and conservative in my life and I appreciate the opportunity to give some back to others who are willing to work for it as I did.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: A public speaker in college who founded a major MicroLending company inspired me to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Create new and inventive ways for companies to analyze their business.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: it is my responsibility to do good, to help rebuild the world as it was created to be. I've lived in many places with no place to call my home community; so, I see the whole world as my community in which to make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I am studying for a PhD in Communication Studies (especially in Health Communication) and I teach basic Communication courses such as Public Speaking, Interpersonal Communication, Persuasion, and Small Group Communication. I also conduct research to explore how communicated Message may bring Hope, especially to the oppressed!

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a helping hand. Many people have helped me get where I am today. It's a way of passing it on.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying at Fort Lewis College. I am majoring in Spanish and Biochemistry with the hope of going to medical school. I like to volunteer and help people and I think that the medical profession will allow me to do this quite often.

lender.name: Gladys
lender.loan_because: I want to offer a lending hand to someone who will help themselves with it. Because there were times I could have used a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I was an assistant to an executive of an insurance company.

lender.name: Jahan
lender.loan_because: I am where I am today because of what others have given to me. Jesus gave his life, parents gave their love, teachers gave their talent, scholarship gave funds, etc.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young people how to live healthy lives.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: God blessed me with many gifts and earthly materials, and I want to share my good fortunes with other needy people so that they may accomplish whatever they want to do in life.
lender.occupational_info: I get to cook in a restaurant for a living. I love what I do; it is my passion.

lender.name: Marty
lender.loan_because: it is our obligation to assist the less fortunate and help their dreams of creating a small business come true
lender.occupational_info: I am a small business owner.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I believe that it is up to mankind to solve it's own problems. If given the opportunity along with the desired drive anyone can improve their situation and lifestyle. It is up to the individual to help others to improve their situation by providing them this opportunity. There are no Gods or Devils, only man and his will for change.
lender.occupational_info: I produce informational videos, low budget movies and advertisements for small local businesses.

lender.name: Clark U. SE Class
lender.occupation: SE - College Professor ( Dr. David A. Jordan)
lender.loan_because: I teach Social Entrepreneurship @ Clark University ( Worcester, MA) and my students want to make a difference in the world ! (djordan@sevenhills.org)
lender.occupational_info: I am both a healthcare administrator as well as a university professor who teaches 'social entrepreneurship' to great students.

lender.name: Roberto
lender.loan_because: They would lend money to me, if I needed, if they could
lender.occupational_info: How would I describe my job? When I understand it, I'll tell... For now, let's say that I'm a specialist of electronics, microchips and little silicon stuff like that. Is it clear, now? So, don't ask...

lender.name: Meg
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage and support people who take responsibility for themselves and their communities.

lender.name: wiel
lender.loan_because: In Holland we consume too much, in many parts of Asia they need so much, so..
lender.occupational_info: I was in a project for payment systems with chip cards

lender.name: Jeff&Julian
lender.loan_because: I want my son to have his eyes on the world and see the impact that people can have when they decide to help others...one micro-loan at a time.

lender.name: Danni R.
lender.loan_because: I loan because I want to make a difference in someone else's life who is trying to better their life through work.
lender.occupational_info: Web development and web site admin.

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: I believe in people's inherent ability to succeed.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I know a little bit of my money can make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies come up with new products and services.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: it seems like a reasonable, productive and human thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I make comics on the internet

lender.name: Kaitlin
lender.loan_because: I want to see others prosper, it's what makes me happy, and it's what God wants me to do.
lender.occupational_info: I go to college for 3 hours a day, and then I come home and study. I live a very blessed life, and that's why I feel I should give.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I want to be a better global citizen.

lender.name: Dustin
lender.loan_because: My philosophy of lending, especially when taking into account the global economy, is that of the avalanche. By helping out a small bit (as much as I can afford) for the right people at the right time, I improve their lives and their business. Consequently, the lives of those in their community are improved through their success. Thusly does a small snowflake tumbling down a hill have the opportunity to grow.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I want others to have the opportunities I grew up with.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: It's fun and rewarding.
lender.occupational_info: I help my employer to win projects that help people around the world.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I think this is an excellent way of helping people, communities, and countries. Also, my parents cannot accuse me of giving somebody a handout.
lender.occupational_info: I develop various computer models (charts and graphs), methods (web sites), and indexes (math equations) that help standardize (make the same) various industries and minimize administrative costs (usually the paperwork cost of doing anything) which makes the world far more efficient and cost-effective.

lender.name: Tonny
lender.loan_because: I'm not alone in this world nor do I posses attributes that make me better than others. I have been lucky, I was given support when I needed it so I'm just trying to do the same for others. I come from Bolivia, a Third world country where many people need a chance to provide for their families and communities, I loan because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a television producer, my works involves the coordination, direction and content of television programs.

lender.name: Jean-Louis
lender.loan_because: It is the only way of climbing the stairs and say goodbye to Assistance and Aid
lender.occupational_info: I make things happen such as connecting sellers and buyers of anything..

lender.name: Bettina
lender.occupational_info: I have to decide whether my company gives insurance to projects like factories and hotels.

lender.name: Taryn
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I manage a business office at a large plant nursery.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.occupation: cook, gardener, artist, maker of things
lender.loan_because: it's great to share. I admire entrepreneurs and I really like to help people with their businesses in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a visual artist. I draw and paint landscapes and still-lifes. I also make experimental abstract paintings with colour and shape.

lender.name: RochelleH
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate

lender.name: Tilly McLain
lender.occupational_info: The hostess of the internet

lender.name: Ben & Nina
lender.loan_because: because it is nice to do and you can help other people by getting stuff they need like clothes and a house.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I don't have a lot of money, but the little I do have can make a far bigger difference to those less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for content regulation in the Australian Communications and Media Authority. I make sure that public broadcasters in Australia meet certain content requirements and generally behave themselves.

lender.name: Sondra
lender.loan_because: We all need a little help once in a while. It takes money to make money.
lender.occupational_info: I design and manufacture one of a kind shell mirrors for designer show rooms and their clients.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to give
lender.occupational_info: I am a student

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: To help those to help themselves

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: My Main Occupation involves Managing and Supervising Patrol and Sentry Officers. I also own a Security Product Company.

lender.name: Nalan
lender.loan_because: it is hard to lend money from financial institutions and most of the time their rules are quite unfair.
lender.occupational_info: Trying to produce art with and through the computer and internet. Doesn't earn much money so far though.

lender.name: Polly
lender.loan_because: In the West we have so much, waste so much, yet can make a difference with so little.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I believe in being the change that I want to see in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I love to do ceramics. I love to make drums and fountains, and everything in between. I want to teach someday, but Im still in school, and until then ill do what i can to help others.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: God gave me gifts that I should give to his children.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I have the means to help.

lender.name: Ginger
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to live in a free country where I feel safe and am able to be successful. I hope this little bit of help gives other people hope and a better life.
lender.occupational_info: With the help of many people I build buildings that sell food and products to the public. I love the people I work with and enjoy the challenge of fixing the many problems that come naturally with construction.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Philippe
lender.loan_because: I believe in putting optimism into action.

lender.name: Doc & Kristin
lender.loan_because: We loan through Kiva because it's an awesome concept. We have been very fortunate in our lives so we felt that this is something we could do to help someone else become fortunate in their lives, too.
lender.occupational_info: His work is to help the company use computers to help their business. ----- Her work is as a school librarian.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I always want to see people that are ambitious and driven have the opportunity they deserve.

lender.name: Kyle Wuokko
lender.loan_because: I believe there is nothing more directly empowering than microfinancing. It helps enable people to work for themselves using their skills to run a successful company and be able to take care of their loved ones all at the same time.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Risk Manager for JPMorgan

lender.name: Dave Ursillo
lender.loan_because: I want to help in every and any small way that I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer and use my writing to help people think about their lives in different ways, hoping to inspire them to be happier, more charitable and giving.

lender.name: Camron
lender.loan_because: ... when you are in the service of your fellow beings, you are only in the service of your God.
lender.occupational_info: I work with technology companies in the US installing and using Product and Portfolio Management Software.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: Aware of the interconnectedness of everything, knowing it is possible for all of us, everywhere, to lead lives of dignity and meaning, I try to embody the ethics of personal and interpersonal responsibility.
lender.occupational_info: I teach mindfulness meditation to individuals and groups.

lender.name: Sam Daams
lender.loan_because: A friend once lent me a little money when I was just starting up my first business. Not everyone has friends that can do that, but everyone deserves that chance I also got.
lender.occupational_info: I own and run some travel businesses, both on- and offline.

lender.name: Iris
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and I want to use what he has given me to help others and I want to be connected to people from other parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I just graduated from university. I studied engineering and linguistics. I am currently working a few part times in education.

lender.name: Ezequiel "Zeke"
lender.loan_because: a lot people don't have what they need and I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student full time in the fifth grade.

lender.name: kei
lender.loan_because: Positive Karma!

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: its nice to think I may have a small chance of making life a bit better for others.
lender.occupational_info: high tech

lender.name: Austin Joe
lender.occupation: Corn Detasseling, Mowing lawns, Concessions UMD.
lender.loan_because: I respect the work that Kiva does, I think loaning to help people with ambition start or expand there business really makes a difference. I think loaning is a much better use of my money than many many other things.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want a chance to give back, even if it's just a little. I believe in empowering people who want to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student studying biology and religion at Luther College in northeastern Iowa.

lender.name: Sheri
lender.loan_because: I believe in the Pay it Forward philosophy.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and help others that have troubles managing thier lives after they have become addicted to drugs or Alcohol.

lender.name: jin
lender.occupational_info: Flydragon tattoo suppliers company is professional supplier for tattoo equipments &body piercing jewelry at competitive price.what about your business recently? we will sent our catalog and details to you. we would like to make business with you in future. I have a sincere thanks and bless my friend be good luck. Best wishes for you!

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: Because I think that I live very well so i can make sacrifices of a few frills and extras that I have which could help to make a difference in someone else's life, and i think if more people did this then human suffering would be a thing of the past
lender.occupational_info: I am just a high school student and I do not have a job. But out of the money my parents give me for lunch I plan to save some of it buy not buying extra food and breakfast in the morning, in this way I hope to save enough money to make a contribution.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: If I can help someone I'm more than happy to. it helps me too.
lender.occupational_info: I keep water and waste flowing. and stop the pipes from leaking. keep it all clear and tight and dry.

lender.name: Brian Ross II
lender.loan_because: I'm an idealist who calls himself cynical.
lender.occupational_info: I go to Virginia Commonwealth University and am currently in the Art Foundation program there which is an incredibly dippy waste of time the administration forces prospective art students to do for some reason. There's a lot of work but most of it is stupid. Next year, I will begin a program in either illustration or sculpture.

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: We all have to help each other.

lender.name: Sharon & Tony
lender.loan_because: Our generous friends and family donated money at our wedding in lieu of gifts. We have decided to lend the money through Kiva in the hope that it will help some people in different parts of the world achieve a better quality of life. The great thing is that when it's paid back, we can lend it out again ..... and again ..... and again!!

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: People need help and even though I don't have much to give it makes me feel good :)

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I love helping people, and I believe that a hand up is much more enriching than a hand-out. I don't have a lot to give, but this is a noble cause where even my small amount can be used effectively.

lender.name: Little Hmong Babies
lender.loan_because: I want to help people, the way I've been helped. It's too bad Laos and China aren't participating in Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I support computers and computer applications.

lender.name: Yadira
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help others while God gives me the chance to be able to make a difference in someones life.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I am convinced this is the best way to affect real change in impoverished nations without giving handouts.

lender.name: d.Lewis
lender.loan_because: .. pay it forward ..
lender.occupational_info: help people when their gas furnace/ appliance is not working

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: others have helped me my whole life
lender.occupational_info:
Mello Music Group is music for the soul, from the heart of American culture.
hiphop.jazz.space.soul & fonk
"Sounds Beautiful like the Truth"

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: My tithing money can be used over and over again...what an awesome system!

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: it is our job to make the newspaper report something good one day
lender.occupational_info: I am a student learning to become a doctor.

lender.name: Luchino
lender.loan_because: I firmly believe that people across the world need to support each other in every means possible.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an activist trying to make my community, and ultimately the world more sustainable. I try to spread hope, peace, and joy as much as I can.

lender.name: Nirali
lender.loan_because: I wish to encourage an entrepreneurial spirit to all those across the world
lender.occupational_info: I am currently studying to be a doctor

lender.name: www.swedpatch.se
lender.loan_because: I think it would help and because it's fun to make a change
lender.occupational_info: www.swedpatch.se www.laserfinder.se www.aldestam.se

lender.name: Brian
lender.occupational_info: I encourage people to vote

lender.name: Midcat & Dave
lender.loan_because: Many people have been kind to us when we desperately needed it, we want to help others. We believe in "paying it forward", and we treat others as we want to be treated.
lender.occupational_info: We try to survive like everyone else in the world, we have 3 children of our own and an adopted son. They all live with us, and we try to make a good happy home for all. Midcat loves Cats, & Hamsters are Dave's favorite pets; you would think that we not get along, but we do! And love each other very much!

lender.name: Tarek
lender.loan_because: I do not believe in Aid money as a form of development but rather in foreign direct investments. People need incentives and a leg to stand on when the funding tap dries out.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an investor in the global markets.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: "Being good is commendable, but only when it is combined with doing good is it useful." ~Author Unknown
lender.occupational_info: I monitor and repair a worldwide network that allows our many offices to communicate.

lender.name: Jaime
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help flight test large airplanes. We fly them beyond all normal limits to help make them safer for everyone.

lender.name: Elin
lender.loan_because: I admire people who have the ambition and creativity to become entrepreneurs, and because I believe that microfinance can help build a stable economy for individuals and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a government agency in Sweden.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: For all the good fortune that has come my way, I owe something in return
lender.occupational_info: I work on computer programs and web sites that will hopefully make our Earth a better world to live on for all creatures.

lender.name: Cullen
lender.loan_because: I like this idea. I think life is about doing what u want, and if I can help people do that then cool. I want people to know that people around the world care about you. That a very good idea to get across. I am blessed to live in the US and have opportunities, so I would like to give to others.

lender.name: The Kelly Correa Family
lender.loan_because: we are compelled to

lender.name: Staff
lender.occupation: We work at x-plore in Norway
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: We assist travellers heading overseas to do volunteer work, amongst others.

lender.name: Pedro
lender.loan_because: It's the least we can do

lender.name: Jolyon
lender.loan_because: I loan because I get to help someone else. I would not be where I am today without help from other people and as such, I'd like to help people keep their self respect and dignity so one day they can help others keep theirs.
lender.occupational_info: I'm part of a cheerful team that's responsible for a large, distributed network and communications systems.

lender.name: DJ Bogtrotter
lender.loan_because: It's just a great idea - saw TV piece on how these microloans have worked really well in South America & am just delighted to have the opportunity to get involved
lender.occupational_info: I edit TV programmes and draw a webcomic in my spare time.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Pierre
lender.loan_because: it is the most effective way to fight against poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I build educational computer video games.

lender.name: Huynh Phuc
lender.loan_because:
Nichts auf der Welt ist so mächtig wie eine Idee, deren Zeit gekommen ist.
